alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Prince George; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 12:19PM EDT until June 12 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHARLES CITY...PRINCE GEORGE...NORTHEASTERN SUSSEX AND NORTHWESTERN SURRY COUNTIES... At 1218 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Garysville, or near Disputanta, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Burrowsville around 1235 PM EDT. Cabin Point around 1250 PM EDT. Waverly around 100 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include New Bohemia, Taylors Corner, Carsley, Prince George Golf, Spring Grove, Brandon, Gwaltney Corner, Oak Hill Corner, Jordan Point Country Club and Savedge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Prince George; Surry; Sussex
